message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is about person re-identification using RGB and infrared images, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper proposes a method for generating cross-modality paired images, which involves learning and optimization techniques, making cs.MM (Multimedia) another likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of deep learning models and optimization algorithms, which are common in cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of reducing modality variation, which is related to the topic of image processing and analysis, making cs.CR (Computer Graphics) a possible sub-category as well.
